message.body: Yo! Are you teaching mondays this fall?

Well, keep this on the downlow bc I have to tell them still but Drexel offered me full time so I have to pull out of my monday classes. I feel bad but have to take it. I'm gonna talk to wendy this week or early next...
Hey! I am teaching Thursdays for sure and either Mondays or Wednesday but Pete hasn't told me yet. I'll ask him!
COngrats on full time! That's so awesome! TIME TO GET PAID! I think I might be at my max limit for classes I can teach but I can probably help find someone to cover.
Sending you a copy of the script now so you can judge it.
Thanka! It'sa year contract but a tenure slot is opening so fingers crossed! Send it!
You will get it dude!!! You are a Philadelphia jewel! I'm at that summer institute right now these kids are nuts (awesome).
